post:
Happy New Year LES-bians.

Here is a limited use (15) promotion code for any Dallas KVM VPS. These run on Ryzen 3900X and 3950X CPUs with datacenter/enterprise NVMe in RAID. While it may not be the deal of the century, I'm certain the value will be seen by users with important applications.

`Promo: spirit30`

1GB RAM
1 Core (3.5-4.7GHz)
15GB NVMe
3TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4, 1 IPv6
$3.50/mo with promo
https://extravm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=12

2GB RAM
2 Cores (3.5-4.7GHz)
30GB NVMe
5TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4, 1 IPv6
$7/mo with promo
https://extravm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=13

_Notes:_
Open a ticket after ordering requesting an extra CPU core be added for free. Systems are connected at 1Gbps to 10Gbps. Once promo use runs out, no more will be added. All VPS have a 3 day / 72 hour refund period no questions asked.

Looking Glass: 
https://dal.lg.extravm.com/
